sentences.text: If I were you, I would tell the truth.
sentences.translation: Si yo fuera tú, diría la verdad.

sentences.text: If it rains tomorrow, we will cancel the trip.
sentences.translation: Si llueve mañana, cancelaremos el viaje.

sentences.text: If they had studied more, they would have passed.
sentences.translation: Si hubieran estudiado más, habrían aprobado.

sentences.text: I would travel more if I had enough time.
sentences.translation: Viajaría más si tuviera suficiente tiempo.

sentences.text: If you speak to him, he will understand.
sentences.translation: Si hablas con él, lo entenderá.

sentences.text: We would have arrived early if we had taken the taxi.
sentences.translation: Habríamos llegado temprano si hubiéramos tomado el taxi.
